snippet: The Queens district attorney said the man, Prodromos Vasilopoulos of Athens, had used the gun Tuesday to subdue and then rape a former girlfriend in the Jamaica neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: The Queens district attorney said the man, Prodromos Vasilopoulos of Athens, had used the gun Tuesday to subdue and then rape a former girlfriend in the Jamaica neighborhood.

headline.seo: Man With Stun Gun in His Carry-On Bag Is Arrested at Kennedy Airport
headline.main: Man With Stun Gun in His Carry-On Bag Is Arrested at Kennedy Airport
headline.print_headline: Man With Stun Gun in His Carry-On Bag Is Arrested at Kennedy Airport
